Anchorman.2.The.Legend.Continues.2014.BDRip.XviD.Dual.Audio-MVP

Unemployed and separated from his wife Veronica (Christina Applegate), Ron Burgundy (Will Ferrell) works as host of shows at Sea World. Invited to work as an anchor at a station that displays news for 24 hours, he decides to meet his team. Brick (Steve Carell), Brian (Paul Rudd) and Champ (David Koechner) accept the invitation of Ron and the quartet to New York to join a major network and compete on a national level.
